clang-analyzer-cplusplus.PlacementNew.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-cplusplus.PlacementNew
Check if default placement new is provided with pointers to sufficient storage
capacity.
The
clang-analyzer-cplusplus.PlacementNew
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-cplusplus.PlacementNew.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
